title: Designing Player Development Pedagogy Through Parkour-Style Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundations of physical education theory and team sports training methodologies
context.additional_context: Focuses on exploring methods for pre-service teachers to apply Parkour training elements in actual physical education classes

learning_goals: Explain strategies for integrating Parkour training principles (obstacle overcoming, spatial awareness) into physical education classes
Design a Parkour-based training program applying a learner-centered approach
Develop lesson scenarios using Parkour activities in small groups and receive peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
